name: gift_ars
background: Woman, friend. Goal: carefully develop into romantic relationship.
relationship_tone: casual and friendly, getting to know each other
strategy_direction: Actively collect basic info through natural conversation: 1) Ask if she has a boyfriend (naturally, not interrogation-style), 2) Ask about her age, what she does for work/study, 3) Ask about hobbies and daily life, 4) Make concrete plans - when she visits Osaka, suggest specific activities (food tour, sightseeing), 5) Build towards real connection, not just small talk. Be direct but casual about getting to know her.
